channel.title: Web services on Maurizio Tammacco's blog 4.0
channel.description: Recent content in Web services on Maurizio Tammacco's blog 4.0

item.title: Web services Contract First development
item.description: WSCF.blue is a great tool for developing web services in a Contract First mode. Develop in such a way means that you start from a WSDL contract that describes everything is concerned with a web service, and only after that you can write code which that contract is based on. Working with a WSDL can be a very error-prone task because a WSDL is a XML file. The WSCF.blue tool is able (among other things) building the server code you need from that file.

item.title: Impossibile aggiungere una service reference in visual studio 2008
item.description: Questo workaround spero sia utile a chi si è trovato nella stessa mia situazione, e cioè che improvvisamente Visual Studio 2008 si rifiuta di aggiungere una Service Reference ad un servizio WCF, dando questo errore: The components required to enumerate web references are not installed on this computer. Please re-install Visual studio. Ho poi scoperto che il problema si presentava anche aggiungendo semplici web reference (ASP .NET web services) a progetti creati con Visual Studio 2005.
